fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, choose a message, and a place to hide your Easter Egg. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can choose to hide your Easter Egg in the channel description of the next day chat, an unarchived thread with the thread creation message deleted, the name of the role of one of the bots (Tatsu or GIM Help Bot), or a role given to the host. In each of these cases, the words "You've found an Easter Egg!" will be hidden in whichever location you choose.
- The first person to notice/point out your Easter Egg receives your message, and will gain a prize of their choice. The prize can be either a one-time role investigation on a target of their choice, an automatic Powerful shield for the next time they're attacked, or a one use Powerful attack night ability.
- Easter Eggs expire after the day ends.
- If you win, your ability gains infinite uses and you can post pictures of grapes in <#970059745807437876>. If you post anything besides grapes, your win is revoked and you die and lose the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully use your ability, and get through the day without anyone noticing your Easter Egg.
